abstract: Malcolm Hoenlein, executive vice chairman of Conference of Presidents of Major American Jewish Organizations, says former Sec of State Hillary Rodham Clinton told him that she wants to restore United States-Israel relationship to constructive footing; comments contrast Obama administration's public criticism of Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu.
lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton told a representative of a group of prominent Jewish leaders that she wanted to put the relationship between the United States and Israel back on “constructive footing.”

headline.main: Clinton Wants to Improve Ties With Israel
headline.print_headline: Clinton Wants to Improve Ties With Israel

snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton told a representative of a group of prominent Jewish leaders that she wanted to put the relationship between the United States and Israel back on “constructive footing.”

keywords.value: Conference of Presidents of Major American Jewish Organizations
